name: Look/Feel Sliders
description:
Sliders for describing a brand or product's look and feel.


How to use


This is a great quick exercise to do with your confused client stakeholder when starting something new. Like many similar exercises, it works best as a springboard for discussions rather than any fixed / concrete decisions.


Other exercises


This exercise works well when paired with with a brand alignment exercise — you start by getting your clients thinking about their voice, their customers, their unique proposition — then BAM, hit them with this to help them clarify their look/feel preferences.
